name: Castaway (1N07, DeuxDeunan)
description:
Castaway is a survival game where you are stuck on an abandoned island and you must survive by crafting weapons and building a fire. Majority of the development was done during a 48h gamejam, but some fixing was done afterwards.

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Run: SHIFT
  • Jump: SPACE
  • Pick up item: E
  • Open/Close Inventory: I
  • Right click in inventory: add item to craft table
  • Equip axe (after crafted): 1
  • Equip spear (after crafted): 2

Recipes:

  • Axe: 2 Wood, 1 Stone
  • Spear: 3 Wood, 1 Stone
  • Campfire: I actually don't remember lol figure it out I guess
